p: The structure determined with the NMR data was confirmed by single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis (See Tables S9â€“S16). Crystallographic data were recorded at 150 K to reduce agitation induced by the length of the valeryl side chain. Compound 2 was named Aspidin VB, and although its presence has already been mentioned in the literature [ 14, 15], this is the first time that it has been isolated and characterized.
